title: Himi 19
lyrics:
M.NG.
1.
Fakafeta’i fai ma’u ai pē,
Ki hotau ‘Otua,
‘I he’ene manatu’i
‘A e tō ki lalo.
2.
Pea ke tau fakafeta’i
Ki he ‘Eiki lelei
‘I he’ene tokanga’i
Hotau laumālie.
3.
Fakafeta’i ki ‘olunga
Pea toe fai pē,
Fakafeta’i kia Sīsū
‘I he’ene ‘ofa.
4.
Na’e ‘ikai kalofaki
‘A ‘ene mo’ui,
‘I he’ene ‘Afio’i
‘Etau tu’utāmaki.
5.
‘Eiki Sīsū fakafeta’i,
Ki he ‘Afiona;
‘I ho’o ‘ofa pehe mai
Ki homau fa’ahinga. *
